did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Minutes of the Virginia Board for Contractors,

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Board for Contractors was established in 1938 to regulate and license businesses that construct or improve facilities on property owned by others. The Dept. of Professional and Occupation Regulation provides administrative support to the Board.

odd.p: These records are part of the Virginia Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation record group (RG 17)

accessrestrict.p: Meeting attachments must be reviewed for personal information and redacted prior to serving.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Board for Contractors, Minutes, [cite specific date and accession used]. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Accession 39374 was transferred by Waters, Dawn - Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation, 3600 West Broad Street, Richmond, Va. 23230, 03/27/2002

controlaccess.corpname: Virginia. -- Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation.

controlaccess.subject: Contractors -- Legal status, laws, etc. -- Virginia.

controlaccess.corpname: Virginia. -- Dept. of Professional and Occupational Regulation.

scopecontent.p: Minutes, agendas and related attachments documenting the activities of the Board for Contractors for the years 1938-1986 and 1994-2010. May also include minutes of informal fact finding conferences related to citizen complaints and conflict of interest letters.
